entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers this morning. Rain at times heavy along parts of the coast early this morning. Fog patches late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain or drizzle. Fog. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain and fog. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
